userStories.title: FDF Question (Same/Different Elevation) Not Syncing
userStories.description: As a user, I want the Same/Different Elevation dropdown to save and sync properly so that my form data is preserved and doesn't block other syncs.
acceptanceCriteria: Same/Different Elevation dropdown value saves locally
Sync does not block or cause other items to get stuck

userStories.title: Sync Error Handling - Prevent Cascade Failures
userStories.description: As a user, I want better error handling during sync so that one failed item doesn't block all other syncs.
acceptanceCriteria: Failed sync items are skipped and retried later
Clear error messages displayed for each failed item
Circuit breaker pattern implemented - after repeated failures, pause and alert user
User can manually retry failed items
Sync queue continues processing other items when one fails

userStories.title: PDF Preview Missing All Images
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see all images in the PDF preview within the app so I can verify my form is complete before submission.
acceptanceCriteria: All images display correctly in PDF preview
Photos attached to forms appear in preview
